entities.description: The raw count of survey responses for categories, without any adjustments for population representation.
The number of responses that are complete and usable for analysis out of the total cases.
The overall count of survey cases, including both valid and invalid ones.
A measure indicating whether an individual has been arrested multiple times.
Code representing specific crimes for which an individual has been arrested.
List of specific crimes, such as Murder, Kidnapping, Rape, Sodomy, etc.

relationships.description: Links the survey response with its raw, unadjusted count.
Relates the survey to the count of complete and usable responses.
Relates the survey to the overall count of cases.
Indicates the arrest segment status of the respondent.
Connects the arrest event with the specific offense code recorded.
Lists specific crimes under the umbrella of UCR arrest offense codes.
